nodes.name: snowflakecrud
nodes.description: This node adds the workflow in the project as an EMR step and executes it.
nodes.details:
EMR Workflow


This node adds the workflow in the project as an EMR step and executes it.
nodes.examples:
EMR Workflow Examples


Example of Adding an EMR Workflow


{
"Name": "MyEMRWorkflow",
"ClusterId": "j-1234567890ABCDE",
"ActionOnFailure": "CONTINUE",
"SparkConf": "spark.executor.instances=2,spark.executor.memory=4g",
"Jars": "s3://my-bucket/my-jar.jar,s3://my-bucket/my-other-jar.jar",
"workflowUUID": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000",
"aws_conn_id": "aws_default",
"deploy-mode": "client",
"parameters": [
{"Key": "inputPath", "Value": "s3://my-bucket/input/"},
{"Key": "outputPath", "Value": "s3://my-bucket/output/"}
],
"trigger_rule": "all_success"
}

Explanation

  • This example demonstrates how to define an EMR workflow with specific parameters, including the task name, action on failure, Spark configurations, and the workflow UUID.

Usage

  • Task ID: "emr_workflow_task"
  • Workflow ID: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000

Example of Adding an EMR Workflow with Specified Cluster ID


{
"Name": "DataProcessingWorkflow",
"ClusterId": "j-0987654321XYZ",
"ActionOnFailure": "TERMINATE_JOB_FLOW",
"SparkConf": "spark.executor.instances=4,spark.executor.memory=8g",
"Jars": "s3://my-bucket/data-processing-jar.jar",
"workflowUUID": "987e6543-e21b-43d3-a654-426614174111",
"aws_conn_id": "my_aws_connection",
"deploy-mode": "cluster",
"parameters": [
{"Key": "inputPath", "Value": "s3://my-bucket/data/"},
{"Key": "outputPath", "Value": "s3://my-bucket/data/output/"}
],
"trigger_rule": "one_success"
}

Explanation

  • This example adds an EMR workflow with a specified cluster ID and a different action on failure. It demonstrates how to adjust parameters for different use cases.

Usage

  • Task ID: "data_processing_workflow_task"
  • Workflow ID: 987e6543-e21b-43d3-a654-426614174111

fields.name: Name
fields.title: Task Name
fields.description: Unique name of the task in Airflow DAG

fields.name: ClusterId
fields.title: Cluster ID
fields.description: If Cluster ID is empty, the step tries to pick the cluster ID from previous create EMR node(task)

fields.name: ActionOnFailure
fields.title: Action On Failure
fields.description: Action to be taken on Failure

fields.name: SparkConf
fields.title: Spark Conf
fields.description: Add spark conf values in comma separated as key=value

fields.name: retry_exponential_backoff
fields.title: Retry Exponential Backoff
fields.description: Allow progressive longer waits between retries by using exponential backoff algorithm on retry delay

fields.name: deploy-mode
fields.title: Deploy Mode
fields.description: Whether to deploy your driver on the worker nodes (cluster) or locally as an external client (client)

fields.name: parameters
fields.title: Parameters
fields.description: List of parameters to be passed to the workflow
